<title level="1" pfs="">[Viktor Volkano](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2013)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Viktor Volkano](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2013)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 29</row>

**Perception** +7

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +4, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[batons doused in flammable oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=38) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 40

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flaming baton +10,
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flame spit +10 ([range 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d8 fire

**Breathe Fire** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) **Requirements** Viktor is holding an ignited baton; **Effect** Viktor breathes fire in a 20-foot cone. Creatures within the cone take 3d6 fire damage (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Once Viktor breathes fire, he cannot do so again for 1d4 rounds.

**Ignite Baton** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Viktor ignites or douses a baton. Ignited batons burn for 10 minutes or until Viktor douses them.

**Set on Fire**   If Viktor critically hits a target with an attack that deals fire damage, or if a target of one of his effects that deals fire damage critically fails its saving throw, the target takes 1d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>
name: Viktor Volkano

text: Viktor Volkano Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Viktor Volkano Source Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 29 Perception +7 Languages Skills Arcana +6, Athletics +6, Crafting +4, Performance +8 Str +2 Dex +3 Con +2 Int +0 Wis +0 Cha +2 Items batons doused in flammable oil (2) --- AC 16 Fort +11 Ref +8 Will +8 HP 40 Resistances fire 5 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action flaming baton +10, Damage 1d6+2 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire Ranged Single Action flame spit +10 (range 10 feet), Damage 2d8 fire Breathe Fire Single Action (Primal, Fire) Requirements Viktor is holding an ignited baton; Effect Viktor breathes fire in a 20-foot cone. Creatures within the cone take 3d6 fire damage (DC 18 basic Reflex save). Once Viktor breathes fire, he cannot do so again for 1d4 rounds. Ignite Baton Two Actions Viktor ignites or douses a baton. Ignited batons burn for 10 minutes or until Viktor douses them. Set on Fire If Viktor critically hits a target with an attack that deals fire damage, or if a target of one of his effects that deals fire damage critically fails its saving throw, the target takes 1d4 persistent fire damage.
